content: cc1 k3 with mc around round 4 k1 with mc k1 with cc1 k4 with mc around round 5 work as for round 3 round 6 work as for round 2 round 7 work as for round 1 *break cc1 ribbing with mc k around once decreasing 2 sts evenly 136 sts ribbing round k2 p2 around repeat ribbing round a total of six times in mc visit follow share visit us follow us share with us #thelambandkid 740 winslow way east @thelambandkid and bainbridge island wa the lamb & kid #tlkdiamondcowl www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid
